articles.author: Ed Cara
articles.title: Drug Overdose Deaths in America Have Finally Stopped Climbing - Gizmodo
articles.description: New preliminary data from the CDC shows that total overdose deaths took a slight dip in 2023, but much more progress is needed, experts say.
articles.content: For the first time in a long while, Americas drug overdose crisis has not gotten worse. New preliminary data from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention shows that total overdose deaths took … [+3386 chars]
